item.title: US to send $1.25 billion in weapons to Ukraine, pushing to get aid out before Biden leaves office
item.description: The United States is expected to announce that it will send $1.25 billion in military assistance to Ukraine, U.S. officials said Friday.

item.title: How five top CEOs described the AI boom in 2024
item.description: CEOs from Nvidia, CrowdStrike, Snowflake, AMD and Generac on how the new technology is affecting business and the broader tech sector.

item.title: Dow falls more than 300 points Friday but breaks 3-week losing streak: Live updates
item.description: The major averages slid on Friday but managed to post weekly gains.
